title: Flirty Racism: It's a Thing
teaser: Flirty compliments often come off as racial micro-aggressions. Latino USA producer Camilo Vargas and VICE writer Rula Al-Nasrawi look at 'flirty racism' in the streets of New York City.
contentencoded: Copyright 2014 NPR. To see more, visit http://www.npr.org/.
